text: The construction of recombinant baculoviral vector vaccines was confirmed by isolating viral genomic DNA from recombinant baculovirus, harvested from infected Sf9 cell using the Nucleospin RNA virus kit (Macherey-Nagel, Düren, Germany), and amplifying HERV, HA, NA, and M1 genes by PCR using primers shown in S1 Table. The quantification of recombinant baculovirus was carried out from recombinant baculovirus DNA using BacPAK™ qPCR Titration Kit (Takara & Clontech, Mountain View, CA, USA), and quantified PCR copy number per milliliter (/ml) was converted to focus forming units (FFU)/ml by according to manufacturer manual.
